abstract: Cable news viewership has been soft for the summer, making it harder for Mr. Cooper to make large gains.
snippet: Cable news viewership has been soft for the summer, making it harder for Mr. Cooper to make large gains.
lead_paragraph: Anderson Cooper moved into the most important time slot on cable news, 8 p.m., last week. But he didn’t receive a very warm reception from viewers.

headline.main: A Slow Start For Anderson Cooper At 8 P.M.
